item.title: Westinghouse ceiling fan remote control with Home Assistant
item.description: The Westinghouse Bendan ceiling fan comes with an infrared remote control (model number ID6) which is used to set the fan speed and turn the light on and off. I’ve wanted to control the fan speed via my phone for a while, and have managed to do this using Home Assistant and a Broadlink RM3 Mini. Linking the RM3 Mini to Home assistant Adding the RM3 Mini to Home Assistant was relatively simple - but don’t bother with any of the instructions about setting up scripts as it’s easier to set the codes manually.
